text: Lethal Weapon 3 is a 1992 comedy-action movie. Mel Gibson plays Martin, Danny Glover plays Roger, Joe Pesci plays Leo and Rene Russo plays Lorna Cole. This movie was released on May 15, 1992. It got mixed reviews. It made over US$320 million. ==Related pages== * Lethal Weapon * Lethal Weapon 2 * Lethal Weapon 4 ==Other websites== * * Category:1992 action movies Category:1992 comedy movies Category:1992 movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Donner Category:Movies composed by Michael Kamen Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: Lethal Weapon 3
